nodes.text: Gemma served the Alliance to Restore the Republic as a pilot in the Fleet during the Battle of Endor against the Galactic Empire. The pilot was killed during the battle and after the battle was won by the Alliance, Gemma was listed as a casualty alongside fellow pilots Snar, Reet and half of Yellow Squadron.
Gemma was first mentioned in the 2015 comic book Shattered Empire 1, which was written by Greg Rucka published as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens multimedia initiative.
